name: Great Pyramids: Romancing the Seven Wonders
name_original: Great Pyramids: Romancing the Seven Wonders
description:
Great Pyramids: Romancing the Seven Wonders is a game developed by Gameshastra. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by Big Fish Games.
You can play Great Pyramids: Romancing the Seven Wonders on PC.
